QuestData.Title: The Box of Many Things
QuestData.Description:
Ah, Maw Walker, of course. Soon I shall be undone, claimed by this place forever. But you continue to walk its halls, unbroken!
It was my great aspiration to prevail with the help of this box. Sadly, I overestimated my own capabilities.
I trust I am not overestimating yours. Take the box. Prove yourself worthy of it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Box of Many Things to the Runecarver.
QuestData.RewardText: Ah... a curious device. Anchoring it in this place will prove useful.
